item.title: Fortnite x Overwatch Crossover Brings Genji, Tracer, D.Va
item.content:encoded:
The Overwatch x Fortnite content has been revealed by a popular leaker.

Fortnite creator Shiina recently shared more news about the collaboration. In a brief YouTube video and on Twitter, they announced that Genji, Mercy, Tracer, and D.Va would be added to the game as skins.

News of the collaboration first dropped back in late January.

More Collaborations Are on Their Way to Fortnite

Shiina also shared on social media that a Lego collaboration was on the way. A new LEGO Pass is slated to drop on April 16.

In other Fortnite news, it‚Äôs been reported that jam tracks, including Eminem‚Äôs ‚ÄúThe Real Slim Shady,‚Äù ‚ÄúFE!N‚Äù by Travis Scott, and ‚ÄúBye Bye Bye,‚Äù have been potentially scrapped.

Overwatch Is Experiencing a Resurgence

Recently, Overwatch announced a major overhaul, returning to its original name and launching a new story arc that will run through 2026. Learn more about ‚ÄúThe Reign of Talon‚Äù at this link.

This move has led to success for the hero shooter, as the game reached an all-time high player count on February 11. Learn more about that here.

Insider Gaming continues to keep track of all of the crossovers coming to Fortnite

Are you excited about the world of Overwatch coming to Fortnite? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Every New Overwatch Hero & Character In 2026: All Voice Actors, Explained
item.content:encoded:
No one saw the huge rebranding of Overwatch coming in 2026, and the revised identity comes with plenty of actual new identities. We‚Äôre taking a look at every new character, the voice actors behind the fresh-faced heroes, and more.

Aside from the rather unfortunate business surrounding Overwatch‚Äôs Anran undergoing a redesign after community backlash, the new cast of characters has been well-received, particularly a certain flying feline.

Props to Blizzard.

All Overwatch Heroes Added In 2026

Blizzard has added five new Heroes to the rebranded Overwatch in 2026: Anran, Domina, Emre, Jetpack Cat, and Mizuki.

There were the first new faces of 2026, with a few more to be added throughout the year. They range from expert warriors to‚Ä¶a cat‚Ä¶with a jetpack. More cats, please.

Anran

Domina

Emre

Jetpack Cat

Mizuki

Who Voices Anran In Overwatch?

Farheea Andersen is the voice actor for Anran in Overwatch.

  • More Insider Gaming: How To Unlock Crimson Wolf In Overwatch‚ÄîWeapon Variant, Explained

The Twitch streamer and content creator was given the honour of playing Anran for Overwatch, and to be fair to her, she didn‚Äôt hold back in her assessment of Anran‚Äôs original design, citing the character as an ‚ÄòOzempic Chic Character Design.‚Äô

This is believed to be Andersen‚Äôs debut role in gaming, movies, and TV.

Who Voices Domina In Overwatch?

Overwatch‚Äôs Domina is voiced by Taj Atwal.

Atwal is a British actress who has racked up acting credits across a multitude of TV shows, from Line of Duty to Hullraisers. It‚Äôs not her first foray into voice-over work, though, as she played Dr. Neema Chandra in Surgeon Simulator 2!

Who Voices Emre In Overwatch?

Actor Kerem Erdinc has confirmed on social media that he is the voice of Emre.

  • More Insider Gaming: Overwatch 2026 Roadmap‚ÄîAll Overwatch 2026 Content, Explained

In an X post, he said: ‚ÄúThe best thing about being the voice actor for Emre is people just let me pick him in the lobby. Gotta show up for the squad if I‚Äôm the one taking Emre for a spin. First match of the night, play of the game? Oh yeah, me and Emre were made for each other.‚Äù

Erdinc has plenty of other video game work under his belt, including Delta Force, Ready or Not, Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty, and much more.

Who Voices Mizuki In Overwatch?

The masked Mizuki is represented by Julian Cihi.

Unless the facts are wrong, that seems to be Cihi‚Äôs debut into the world of video gaming voice-over work, too! Before grabbing the role of Mizuki with both horns, Cihi has appeared in several shows, such as Only Murders in the Building.

What have you made of the new characters in the 2026 makeover for Overwatch? What kind of new Heroes are you hoping to see in the future? Leave your wild predictions or insider guesswork with IG through the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

Check out all the new content in Overwatch Season 1 (2026), if you haven‚Äôt already.

item.title: Does Mewgenics Have Controller Support? PlayStation & Xbox Controller Support On Steam, Explained
item.content:encoded:
The usual array of questions is being thrown at Mewgenics, as a Steam title. This includes wondering about its Steam Deck compatibility and if the game supports PlayStation and/or Xbox controller support.

Mewgenics needs to be enjoyed in any way possible. The cuddly yet catastrophically grim and violent cat-oriented strategy title has wowed everyone since its February 10 release, and if you‚Äôre looking to play it on Steam, controller support could be a sticking point.

Can You Play Mewgenics Using a PlayStation or Xbox Controller?

Mewgenics has complete PlayStation and Xbox controller support, and this has been verified and confirmed by its official Steam store listing.

Good news: If you want to play Mewgenics with a PS5 or Xbox Series X|S controller (or something adjacent), you can.

  • More Insider Gaming: Is Mewgenics on PlayStation, Xbox, or Switch? Console Release Date, Explained

There‚Äôs always an iffy element of can you/can‚Äôt you with games on Steam, even if they‚Äôre only available to buy on the platform. Some are only usable with a mouse and keyboard, as the configuration is easier to manage.

However, if you check the Mewgenics Steam page, you‚Äôll clearly see a box in the right column saying ‚ÄòFull Controller Support,‚Äô with Xbox Controllers and PlayStation Controllers listed, too.

Connecting a controller is easy, as you can do it either directly through a USB cable and looking for the device, or manually setting it up by connecting the controller and computer system using Bluetooth.

It‚Äôs as easy as training a cat, sort of.

Is Mewgenics Steam Deck Verified?

Steam Decks are compatible with Mewgenics, meaning you can play using your Steam console if you want.

A little bonus question answered for you: Steam Deck verification is A-ok for Mewgenics!

  • More Insider Gaming: Mewgenics Release Date Countdown & Exact Start Times

Again, you‚Äôd think it would be self-explanatory, but not all games have Steam Deck support. Mewgenics does, and that‚Äôs all that meowtters for this query.

Check out the Steam compatibility evaluation:

‚ÄúValve‚Äôs testing indicates that Mewgenics is Verified on Steam Deck. This game is fully functional on Steam Deck, and works great with built-in controls and display.‚Äù

It‚Äôs always good to get the IG community‚Äôs thoughts on things like this: Do you prefer using a controller for Steam games? Or are you part of the PC master race who settle for nothing less than a mouse and keyboard? Jot down your thoughts via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For something similar, check out if Hytale has controller support.

item.title: Today‚Äôs Strands #710 Hints and Answers for February 11, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Strands is a daily word search puzzle game from The New York Times. It is a relatively new game, launched in 2024, in which players seek a common theme among words in a 6√ó8 letter grid.

Whether it‚Äôs your first time playing or you‚Äôre a Strands veteran, today‚Äôs tips and strategies can help you find words faster. So, if you‚Äôve found yourself stuck with today‚Äôs Strands, don‚Äôt worry, below you‚Äôll find some helpful hints and even the answers for Strands Game #710 for Wednesday, February 11, 2026

To play today‚Äôs Strands, head to the game‚Äôs website.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today‚Äôs edition of Strands. If you don‚Äôt want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Strands

Strands is a daily word search that challenges you to find words with a common theme. There‚Äôs also a Spanagram that reveals the deeper theme behind the words.

  • Words that are three letters and under do not count.
  • Words that reveal the correct theme appear in blue.
  • The Spanagram turns yellow when found.
  • Finding three words that don‚Äôt fit the theme will reveal a hint to help you find the proper words.

The goal is to string together as many words as possible. Every letter on the grid gets used! Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Strands can only be played on the New York Times website. You can also play on the NYT Games app.

Strands Hints For Today, February 11, 2026

The Strand‚Äôs answer for game #710 may drive you nuts. I was able to identify some of the theme words, the Spanagram, and several hint words. I used two hints.

General Strands Hints For February 11

Without giving today‚Äôs Strands answers completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: The subtitle of today‚Äôs puzzle is Crack and Snack. However, you‚Äôre not thinking of just any snacks or even crackers.
  • Hint 2: The puzzle might drive you a little nutty, but don‚Äôt spend too much time thinking about the Planters mascot.
  • Hint 3: You might be able to roast these on an open fire, but you won‚Äôt be singing about it during the holidays.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Strands #710 for February 11, 2026.

Words to Help You Find Strand Hints for February 11, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today‚Äôs Strands answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • NUTS
  • SAND
  • CAPE
  • LAND
  • CAST
  • CUTS

Today‚Äôs Strands Answer For Game #710 On February 11, 2026

If you‚Äôve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answers to today‚Äôs Strands below.

  • FILBERT
  • PECAN
  • MACADAMIA
  • ALMOND
  • CASHEW
  • PISTACHIO
  • SPANAGRAM: GONUTS

If you solved today‚Äôs Strands without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow‚Äôs puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

When Is The Next Strands Game After #710?

All New York Times games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before, giving players a heads-up. The game on February 11 will be Strsnds Game #710.

What Is Strands?

Strands is a daily word search puzzle game created by The New York Times. Launched in 2024, Strands challenges players to discover a common theme among words in a 6√ó8 letter grid. The game‚Äôs original concept was developed by Juliette Seive, a research director on The New York Times Games team, with the aim of replicating Wordle‚Äôs success. Tracy Bennett serves as the puzzle editor for Strands, overseeing the creation and curation of daily puzzles since its launch.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.
